name: SFSSG
description:
Semi-Finished Satisfying? Shooter Game

This game is only Semi-Finished, Meaning :

you can still play it, but you won't get damaged (you're INVINCIBLE!!! YAY 😊 ).

and there's no YOU WON!!! screen 🥲 etc...

But what's currently available to play is kinda exciting... (I hope 😅)

Current Gameplay Features
  • Multiple Enemy Types
  • Special attacks for different enemy types
  • 1 Normal Attack with multiple Ammo Types
  • 3 Special Attacks
  • Wave based gameplay
Tools Unreal Engine 5BlenderAudacityFigma
